title: Pandora 's advertising revenue 2006 to 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 12 number of Years.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Year 2017 and lowest at Year 2006.
There is a difference of 1071.68 between the maximum Year 2017 and minimum Year 2006.
